com.brickgame.games

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brickgame.games.GameEngine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroids, Breakout, Snake, Tetris

    public abstract class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Engine for pixel games in a 20x10 grid.
    Since:
    1.8
